title: BRIEF-Waddell & Reed Reports AUM Of $80.2 Bln For Month Ended March 31
text:
April 11, 2018 / 8:34 PM / Updated 8 minutes ago BRIEF-Waddell & Reed Reports AUM Of $80.2 Bln For Month Ended March 31 Reuters Staff 
April 11 (Reuters) - Waddell & Reed Financial Inc: * ANNOUNCES MARCH 31, 2018 ASSETS UNDER MANAGEMENT 
* PRELIMINARY ASSETS UNDER MANAGEMENT OF $80.2 BILLION FOR MONTH ENDED MARCH 31, 2018, COMPARED TO $81.4 BILLION ON FEBRUARY 28, 2018 Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Reuters.Briefs@thomsonreuters.com)
